Key Match Events: Spencer Torkelson hit a two-run homer in the bottom of the 5th inning
Riley Greene hit a two-run homer in the bottom of the 6th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers earned their second series win in the last 13 against Boston
The Tigers won the season series against the Red Sox for the first time since 2017
Others: Brant Hurter pitched five innings of one-run ball for the win
Jason Foley got his 20th save with a perfect ninth
